general_advisory: Based on five days weather forecast, continue intercultural operations, harvesting, and apply pesticides as needed. Start field preparation for rabi crops and transplant mature seedlings during clear weather. Regular surveillance for insect pests.

advisory: For neck blast disease management apply Tricyclazole (Beam) @ 0.6 g/l of water.
To control steam borer & leaf folder spray chlorpyriofos/profenofos.
Spray Imidachloprid @ 0.6 ml / liter of water to control the BPH.
To control ear cutting caterpillar, spray Quinalphos 25 EC or Chlorpyriphos 20 EC at root zone in morning hours.
Apply Flubendiamide 39.35 % SC @ 4 ml mixed with 10 liters of water to control infestation of American cob borer.
Present weather conditions are favorable for sowing of Horse gram & Bengal gram. Treat seeds with fungicide and Rhizobium culture before sowing.
Start land preparation and sowing to get optimum yield. Use suitable varieties and spray neem oil to control insects at seedling stage.
Go for weeding and apply urea and MoP per acre after planting. Apply mulching for better growth.
Prepare nursery beds and apply required nutrients. Choose suitable varieties and quantities for planting.
Prepare nursery beds and apply required nutrients. Choose suitable varieties and quantities for planting.
Complete weeding and top dressing. Control rhizome rot with appropriate measures.
Regularly check animals for signs of dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections. Deworm and vaccinate as needed.
Regularly check animals for signs of dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections. Deworm and vaccinate as needed.
